story_summary.description: Neutral summary of what happened in the story. Stick to the basic facts. 1-2 sentences maximum.

reader_guidance.description: Brief guidance helping readers understand the analysis results. 1-2 sentences.

consensus.description: Key-value pairs. The key is the agreed-upon fact, and the value is the list of sources confirming it. Max 4 facts.

key_differences.description: List of the most important differences (max 3), with each difference formatted as a single string.

items.description: IMPORTANT: Use the exact format 'Aspect: [What differs] | Group A ([Source1, Source2]): [Their approach] | Group B ([Source3, Source4]): [Their approach]'
